TopicTitle: Star Wars Videos by Jolly Roger

Articles.Content:
I've set up a play list with all my Star Wars videos - now they're all in one place

JR

Edited March 24, 2016 by Jolly_Roger

Hearing you speak completely changes the way I see your craft now. It is so humanising. I love the droids mate they are the kind of thing I wish I had made! Keep up the good work, I will subscribe to your YT channel now too.

MJ

4 hours ago, Majorjim said:

Hearing you speak completely changes the way I see your craft now. It is so humanising. I love the droids mate they are the kind of thing I wish I had made! Keep up the good work, I will subscribe to your YT channel now too.

MJ

I thought I would try change up the video format a bit - with me speaking it does give more of a connection and it's easier for me to explain how things work.  As far as the droids go that was just something that happened by chance.  I think someone actually posted a picture of a droid on the forums a while ago.  I get lots of my ideas from the unique and creative designs that I find here and in some cases I use the actual craft - like your AT-ST walker.  I said it before and I'll say it again , it's an amazing design and I want to put it in one (or more) of my videos, I've already got the craft downloaded, I just need to get to it.  I think I downloaded a snow speeder of yours a while back too..

JR

Thanks man, yeah the speeder was just a design thing, it could not fly without infinite fuel.. I think the AT-ST was a bit borked by the new updates and was mega high in part count. I might have a look at it and try to lower the count with the offset mod. I would absolutely love to see a removable droid in the top of a Star wars craft, I really liked the cargo bay one in the video.

That's what pirate tech was supposed to fix.

JR

On 3/28/2016 at 6:49 PM, Jolly_Roger said:

I have 9 Star Wars videos now.... I'm not sure how to feel about that
